title: Griddled lamb chops with inzimino
description: Inzimino sounds exotic, but in fact it is an easy chard and chickpea stew that goes perfectly with succulent griddled lamb chops.
ingredients: 1 head of Swiss chard, stems cut into 1cm/½in slices, leaves halved
1 char-grilled red pepper, skin and seeds removed, cut into strips
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
